Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica

The Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica (AISF) is a non-profit organization with educational purposes that gathers together all the Italian students of physics. It was founded in Heidelberg in August 2014 and since January 2015 is a National Committee of the International Association of Physics Students (IAPS). It counts more than 900 members and 17 Local Committees.
